name: Spike Out
description:
A twin-stick arcade survival game, from the team that brought you MeatScape.

Test your prowess in the spike arena, battling your way through spinning tops of death to achieve the highest score!

This project began with a self-hosted weekend game jam, and we loved the idea so much that we've spent the past 7 weeks pouring ourselves into it to bring our vision to life!

ControlsMouse+KeyboardGamepad MoveWASD or ArrowsLeft stick AimMouseRight stick StabLeft clickRight bumper BombSpacebar/Right Click
Left bumper PauseEscapeStart Quick restartR (hold)Select (hold)
Share your feedback!

We've spent countless hours playtesting it ourselves, but this is our first alpha release so your feedback is invaluable! We need your help to figure out what's good about this game and what isn't. Your feedback will be an important influence on where this project goes next.

Please, take a few minutes to let us know your thoughts on the experience through this feedback survey. (We promise it's short, no essays required)

Or if you find any nasty bugs while playing, help us squash them by filling out this bug report form.
